paper_title.ja: 自由縁特異応力の減少に係わる知的形状設計について
paper_title.en: Intelligent Shape Design for Reduction of Free-Edge Singular Stress

description.ja: Shape optimization is applied to dissimilar material joints to decrease free-edge singular stress using a CAE system of finite element-based shape optimization programs. The optimum shape of a joint with an interlayer is similar to the case of that without an interlayer. It is revealed that the free-edge singular stress decreases in the optimum shape. Shape optimization is a useful method for designing dissimilar material joints from the point of view of decreasing singular stress.
description.en: Shape optimization is applied to dissimilar material joints to decrease free-edge singular stress using a CAE system of finite element-based shape optimization programs. The optimum shape of a joint with an interlayer is similar to the case of that without an interlayer. It is revealed that the free-edge singular stress decreases in the optimum shape. Shape optimization is a useful method for designing dissimilar material joints from the point of view of decreasing singular stress.

paper_title.ja: 窒化ケイ素のクリープ疲労設計の観点からの超高温破壊特性
paper_title.en: High Temperature Fracture and Creep-Fatigue Characteristics for Structural Design of Silicon Nitride

description.ja: High temperature creep and creep-fatigue fracture behavior were investigated in air on two kinds of silicon nitride with different additives of MgO+Y<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub> and Al<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub>+Y<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub>. Fracture elongation was almost identical in the both cases of creep and creep-fatigue tests at 1673K in air for the two kinds of silicon nitride. The fracture surface was rough in the creep test specimens, while it was relatively smooth in the creep-fatigue test specimens. In the creep-fatigue tests, fracture lifetime was shorter than that of the creep tests. However, for the silicon nitride with MgO+Y<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub> the fracture lifetime in the creep-fatigue tests approached to the level of creep tests with increasing the hold time under no stress in the wave pattern. It seems that some intelligent function of the self-repairing of materials damage occurs in silicon nitride with MgO+Y<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub>.
description.en: High temperature creep and creep-fatigue fracture behavior were investigated in air on two kinds of silicon nitride with different additives of MgO+Y<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub> and Al<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub>+Y<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub>. Fracture elongation was almost identical in the both cases of creep and creep-fatigue tests at 1673K in air for the two kinds of silicon nitride. The fracture surface was rough in the creep test specimens, while it was relatively smooth in the creep-fatigue test specimens. In the creep-fatigue tests, fracture lifetime was shorter than that of the creep tests. However, for the silicon nitride with MgO+Y<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub> the fracture lifetime in the creep-fatigue tests approached to the level of creep tests with increasing the hold time under no stress in the wave pattern. It seems that some intelligent function of the self-repairing of materials damage occurs in silicon nitride with MgO+Y<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub>.

paper_title.ja: セラミックスの超高温環境下での強度とクリ-プ疲労特性
paper_title.en: High Temperature Strength and Creep-Fatigue Behavior of Ceramics

description.ja: High temperature strength, creep and creep-fatigue behavior were investigated in air for Al<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub>, SiC and Si<sub>3</sub>N<sub>4</sub> ceramics. The high temperature tensile strength was influenced by the existence of additives in ceramics. The tensile strength showed displacement rate dependence. In the creep-fatigue tests of Si<sub>3</sub>N<sub>4</sub> at 1673K, not only hysteresis loops but also ratchetting behavior were observed in the stress-displacement curves. It seemed that the fracture occurred when the total plastic ratchetting deformation reached a constant value.
description.en: High temperature strength, creep and creep-fatigue behavior were investigated in air for Al<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub>, SiC and Si<sub>3</sub>N<sub>4</sub> ceramics. The high temperature tensile strength was influenced by the existence of additives in ceramics. The tensile strength showed displacement rate dependence. In the creep-fatigue tests of Si<sub>3</sub>N<sub>4</sub> at 1673K, not only hysteresis loops but also ratchetting behavior were observed in the stress-displacement curves. It seemed that the fracture occurred when the total plastic ratchetting deformation reached a constant value.
